caption.title: Transmission of Zika virus. (1) Infected mosquito (particularly female A. aegypti) may bite a healthy human. The Zika infected human may act as a source of infection for other humans in the community. (2) Infected pregnant woman may act as a source for Zika virus transmission to her fetus. (3) Human to human transmission may occur by sexual interaction between male and female. (4) Blood transfusion may cause Zika virus transmission from one human to another.
